version_description:
- Added weekly, monthly and yearly subscriptions so users don't have to pay per save
- Improved tracking allows for faster scanning
- Improved color for better looking scans
- Added ability to scan without capturing color

- Users can start and stop scan capture with volume buttons (up or down).
- Better scans with haptic feedback! App provides haptic feedback (vibration) when the camera loses tracking - keep the phone still until the vibration stops and then continue your scan. Provides a better scanning experience for the user.
- Now offers option to export files as .ply, .obj. or .stl
- Bug fix - preview screen slider now reflects bounding box size after saving or deleting a scan

- Implemented free mesh save for first time users and a free mesh save every week.
- Improved UI for easier navigation to scan screen.
- Improved UX for easier recognition of scan bounding box during preview.
- Fixed a bug where .obj and .stl files were not being exported correctly in certain situations.

Now with Measurement features on saved scans! Users on Preview Scan can tap Viewer Mode and drop the saved mesh into Augmented Reality. Tapping the Ruler icon from the menu allows users to drop points on the mesh and extract measurements between points.

BUG FIX:
Fixes app crashing on launch from previous update (1.4.8). Sorry to anyone affected by this!

NEW FEATURES:
Measuring capabilities: Users can measure true distance between multiple points in AR!
Speed Improvements to the preview while creating a scan

BUG FIX: 
Fixes the bug that created the annoying popup every time a scan was saved.
Fixes the bug that prevented device recognition when starting networked scanning.

RECENTLY ADDED FEATURES:
Measuring capabilities: Users can measure true distance between multiple points in AR!
Haptic feedback when tracking is lost.
Speed Improvements to the preview while creating a scan.

BUG FIX: Fixes the bug that caused app to crash when navigating to links in the drawer.

RECENTLY ADDED FEATURES:
Measuring capabilities: Users can measure true distance between multiple points in AR!
Haptic feedback when tracking is lost.
Speed Improvements to the preview while creating a scan.

BUG FIX: Fixed bug where importing scans was failing.
Fixed bug where selecting a scan to view in AR was failing.
Fixed bug where failing to show depth stream after camera permission dialog.

RECENTLY ADDED FEATURES:
Measuring capabilities: Users can measure true distance between multiple points in AR!
Haptic feedback when tracking is lost.
Speed Improvements to the preview while creating a scan.

Updated Settings Page - check it out for notifications and advanced configurations.

Introducing Scan Mode v2 (under Advanced Preferences in Settings) which enables “unbounded” scanning. This will remove the restriction on Scan Size and attempt to allocate the necessary space adaptively during the scan process. Scandy created in this mode will have larger file sizes!

RECENTLY ADDED FEATURES:
Measuring capabilities: Users can measure true distance between multiple points in AR!
Haptic feedback when tracking is lost.
Speed Improvements to the preview while creating a scan.

Speed optimizations in pipeline creating better scanning experience. Scan faster and with better results.
More responsive Preview Screen.
Updated Settings Page and Capture Screen.
Bug fixes.
RECENT UPDATES
Introducing Scan Mode v2 (under Advanced Preferences in Settings) which enables “unbounded” scanning. This will remove the restriction on Scan Size and attempt to allocate the necessary space adaptively during the scan process. Scandy created in this mode will have larger file sizes!

Bug fixes where some users on iOS 11 were having issues where the app was showing a black screen when trying to start a scan, resulting in vibrating phone and no scan capture.
RECENT UPDATES
Improved tracking resulting in faster scanning. Introduced Scan Mode v2 (under Advanced Preferences in Settings) which enables “unbounded” scanning. This will remove the restriction on Scan Size and attempt to allocate the necessary space adaptively during the scan process. Scans created in v2 mode will have larger file sizes!

Improved scanning speed.
Improved per-vertex color.
Improved performance in mirrored scanning with reduced packet size.
RECENT UPDATES
Improved tracking resulting in faster scanning. Introduced Scan Mode v2 (under Advanced Preferences in Settings) which enables “unbounded” scanning. This will remove the restriction on Scan Size and attempt to allocate the necessary space adaptively during the scan process. Scans created in v2 mode will have larger file sizes!

Users now get a free scan save every day. New lower prices on subscriptions for unlimited saves.
Better color output - fixes seam highlights.
Users can share a video of scans without having to save. Scanning functionality added for new iPad Pro users.

Fixed bug in the decimate function.
Added notification for non-TrueDepth devices.
Fixed OBJ texture loading for more configurations.
RECENT UPDATES: Users now get a free scan save every day.
New lower prices on subscriptions for unlimited saves.
Better color output - fixes seam highlights.
Scanning functionality added for new iPad Pro users.
Adds USDZ export support!

Adds GLB (glTF Binary) support!
You can upload scans to Facebook, 8thwall, and other platforms that support glTF/glb files.
Increased performance, speed, and reliability!

Fixed bug associated with decreased color quality.
Added additional analytics tracking - can be opted out of from settings menu 'ABOUT SCANDY PRO'
RECENT UPDATES: Users now get a free scan save every day.
New lower prices on subscriptions for unlimited saves.
Better color output - fixes seam highlights.
Scanning functionality added for new iPad Pro users.

Fixed networked scanning bug that was impacting some users
RECENT UPDATES: Users now get a free scan save every day.
New lower prices on subscriptions for unlimited saves.
Better color output - fixes seam highlights.
Scanning functionality added for new iPad Pro users.

Added a request for app store reviews - we're hoping to draw honest feedback from everyday users to better understand what their needs and pain points.

Thanks for your continued support!

- New edit UI
- Auto clean, remove small pieces from a scan
- Hole filling, files in some holes from a scan
- Normal renderer mode. Choose between color, monochrome, and normals
- Previous bounding box size or resolution are stored between scanning sessions
- Networking preferences are stored between scanning sessions

- Fix: bug where AR would not load a model on the first attempt squashed.
- Fix: bug where AR measuring wasn't showing the line between two points no longer buzzing in your ear
- Fix: bug causing external models to import without color shooed away.
- Performance: AR now loads faster and has smaller files (using USDZ files instead of OBJs)
- Design: updated design of AR elements for easier positioning
- Design: updated the Subscription page to include more information about purchase options
- Design: Removed intermediate "Freebie" page. Now included alongside Subscriptions

"- New Fix: fixed import 3D file screen UI bug
----- RECENT FIXES ------
- Fix: bug where Augmented Reality would not load a model on the first attempt squashed.
- Fix: bug where Augmented Reality measuring wasn't showing the line between two points no longer buzzing in your ear
- Fix: bug causing external models to import without color shooed away.
- Performance: AR now loads faster and has smaller files (using USDZ files instead of OBJs)
- Design: updated design of AR elements for easier positioning
- Design: updated the Subscription page to include more information about purchase options
- Design: Removed intermediate ""Freebie"" page. Now included alongside Subcriptions"

Added two features:
- Save Raw Input: Save's the raw input PLY and JPEG files that are used to create the scan.
- Texture mapping: Uses images overlaid on top of the mesh instead of per-vertex coloring.

-------

NOTE: You should practice scanning with texture mapping on to see how it differs from per-vertex. Also, we save all the images separately and their pose information if you want to re-texture the scan in your software of choice.

Bug fix:
- Fixed bug where screen would hang when discarding a texture-mapped scan.
Recent additions:
- Save Raw Input: Saves the raw input PLY and JPEG files that are used to create the scan.
- Texture mapping: Uses images overlaid on top of the mesh instead of per-vertex coloring.
-------

- Fixed bug where v2 scanning wasn't working on iOS13

- removed 0.5mm resolution option until it is fixed
- changed unit selection for AR measurement tool
-------
RECENT ADDITIONS: Texture Mapping
NOTE: You should practice scanning with texture mapping on to see how it differs from per-vertex. Also, we save all the images separately and their pose information if you want to re-texture the scan in your software of choice.

- fixed 0.5mm resolution and reintroduced that as an option
- improved tracking quality
- enabled full-resolution preview image when scanning using a mirrored device for preview
-------
RECENT ADDITIONS: Texture Mapping
NOTE: You should practice scanning with texture mapping on to see how it differs from per-vertex. Also, we save all the images separately and their pose information if you want to re-texture the scan in your software of choice.

- Added world-scale scanning with front-facing camera. Please note that front-facing scanning will NOT offer high-detailed object scanning, but only low resolution scanning suitable for large scenes.
-------
RECENT ADDITIONS: Texture Mapping
NOTE: You should practice scanning with texture mapping on to see how it differs from per-vertex. Also, we save all the images separately and their pose information if you want to re-texture the scan in your software of choice.

Improved tracking performance which provides better color results on scans
Fixed bug that was causing crashes for a limited number of users

-------
RECENT ADDITION: Added world-scale scanning with front-facing camera.
NOTE: Front-facing scanning will NOT offer high-detailed object scanning, but only low resolution scanning suitable for large scenes.

RECENT ADDITION: Texture Mapping
NOTE: You should practice scanning with texture mapping on to see how it differs from per-vertex. Also, we save all the images separately and their pose information if you want to re-texture the scan in your software of choice.

"Faster meshing after a scan
Better decimation (preserves details better)
Auto clean tool only removes small pieces of scans and preserves larger sections
Color fidelity improvements
-------

RECENT ADDITION: Texture Mapping
NOTE: You should practice scanning with texture mapping on to see how it differs from per-vertex. Also, we save all the images separately and their pose information if you want to re-texture the scan in your software of choice."

Added support for LiDAR room scale scanning on new iPad Pro
Updated plane cropping tool for better performance
-------

RECENT ADDITION: Texture Mapping
NOTE: You should practice scanning with texture mapping on to see how it differs from per-vertex. Also, we save all the images separately and their pose information if you want to re-texture the scan in your software of choice.

Improved speed of scanning
Color background during LiDAR scans
Mesh dimension stats in edit screen
-------

Added support for LiDAR room scale scanning on new iPad Pro
Texture Mapping
NOTE: You should practice scanning with texture mapping on to see how it differs from per-vertex. Also, we save all the images separately and their pose information if you want to re-texture the scan in your software of choice.

fixed bug on mirrored scanning preview

New Features
• Added a delay and auto-stop timer to scan capture
• New onboarding video on initial app launch
• YouTube tutorial videos now available to view from within app in Settings menu

Additional Upgrades
• Upgraded Roux to v0.7.2
• Minor bug fixes and improvements

New Feature
• Improved iPad landscape orientation compatibility
• Added a delay and auto-stop timer to scan capture
• New onboarding video on initial app launch
• YouTube tutorial videos now available to view from within app in Settings menu

Additional Upgrades
• Upgraded Roux to v0.7.2
• Minor bug fixes and improvements

Thank you for your patience while we work through in-app purchase issues. We will be making incremental updates introducing logging and crash reports as we track down separate issues users encounter


- We added a “Rage Shake” menu to assist in fixing this hard-to-find bug - shake your device to send us information that may help us diagnose the issue.
- Fixes issue with save scan button not responding

Thank you for your patience while we work through in-app purchase issues. We will be making incremental updates introducing logging and crash reports as we track down separate issues users encounter

- Added additional support for diagnostics gathering and logging (user mail no longer required).
- Added fallback UI for certain users experiencing white-screen bug

- Added fallback UI for certain users experiencing white-screen bug
- Added back "rage-shake" debug menu
